workshoptitle: Publishing Compute Images to Oracle Marketplace

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create a Custom Compute Image for Marketplace
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to create an OCI marketplace compute based artifact from your custom image, and use it to create a private listing on marketplace exclusively dedicated to your LiveLabs workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Request Publisher Access in Oracle Marketplace
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to get publish privileges in Oracle Marketplace.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Publish Your Image to Oracle Marketplace
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to publish your image to Oracle Marketplace.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
